attributes.action: Have a bank holiday on the Monday after our boys bring it home
attributes.additional_details: Get a bank holiday in place
attributes.background: To celebrate our first triumph in international football since 1966 a bank holiday would be perfect way for country to celebrate properly.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
